response.overview: "It's my treehouse!" Toby announced selfishly. To any normal boy, Toby's pride was understandable. For the treehouse was quite a structure, the finest treehouse any of the boys at Sunday School had ever seen. Toby was willing to share it - with his hand-picked favorite friends, that is. These included Josh. But then Josh suggested they let Randy join their club. "That thief?" Toby scowled. "He became a Christian at Camp," Josh reminded. "If he's a Christian, I'm a pelican!" Toby countered. "The only reason he comes to our Sunday School is because he like all the neat things we do. Everybody know he's a thief." A thief? Was he really? Well, Toby got a chance to check. With the help of Dooley - fall guy and follower - Toby set a trap. And Randy walked right into it! What happened, though, didn't quite fit Toby's expectations.
response.title: Toby's Treehouse
